data_table.description: The data table contains sample analyte type (DNA or RNA), disease state of sample (tumor or normal/in remission), and sample type obtained from subjects in the Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia Phase 2 (ALLP2) substudy. A new variable, DISEASEPROJECT, has been added to track the disease project of the sample.

variable.name: SAMPLETYPE
variable.value: Primary Blood Derived Cancer - Bone Marrow
Primary Blood Derived Cancer - Peripheral Blood
Recurrent Blood Derived Cancer - Bone Marrow
Recurrent Blood Derived Cancer - Peripheral Blood
